feed.title: SWALLOW THE SKY
feed.subtitle: Three-piece band from northeast Tennessee formed in 2014.

entry.title: Upcoming shows
entry.content:
Here are our currently booked shows:

  • JUN 3 with Chalwa at Sleepy Owl Brewery in Kingsport, TN (Facebook Event)
  • JULY 9 with Witchhelm, Mountain King, Split Tusk, and Rat Punch at The Bowery in Knoxville, TN (Facebook Event)

See you soon.

entry.title: New Site
entry.content: Welcome to the new Swallow the Sky site. We will be posting news about upcoming shows and releases here.
entry.summary: Welcome to the new Swallow the Sky site.
